meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>furnace</kanji> <kanji>heart</kanji> is the heart of the furnace. The heart of this particular furnace, the one we're talking about here, is the <vocabulary>nuclear reactor core</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
